name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - H and I | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Each question will have three clues.  The first clue is the longest word, which starts with an H or I.  The second clue's answer drops the first letter, and the first letter of that word is dropped to form the third answer.  For instance, if the clue reads "Beverage - Hockey arena - Pen fluid", you know the answer is "Drink - Rink - Ink".  However, I only want the first word as the answer.  So, in this case, you would type "drink".  Got it?

Fence at the bottom of a ditch - Eureka! - Interjection showing surprise
Warmth - Consume - Location; e.g. _ the store
60 minutes - Belonging to us - Ancient Sumer city
Very healthy; e.g. _ and hearty - Lager - French article

Now they will all start with I!

Picture - Magic practicing creature from "World of Warcraft" - Years of existence
Muslim religion - Banging of a door - Hit
Middle eastern country - Sprinted - Article; e.g. _ apple
Muslim priest - Formal way of addressing a woman - Are; e.g. I _
questions.explanation:
Imam.

	Imam - Mam - Am Mam is more appropriately written as Madam or Ma'am.
